related_questions.question:
W-O-B-L-I-N-G . A good word is … *
Tolong dijawab cepat 
jangan ngasal ngasal .....​

Read the paragraph below.    Rudi and his classmates played basketball earlier in the morning at school. Many students watched them. The game was exciting before an accident happened. Unfortunately, Rudi injured his ankle. He fell on the court. His friends took him to the school clinic. Later in the night, he can barely sleep. ....

The best sentence to complete the paragraph is ....

a. he is hurtful enough to sleep
b. it's too painful for him too 
sleep
c. it's enough hurtful for him too sleep
d. the paint is painful too to sleep
e. he ankle is enough hurt too sleep​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Read the paragraph below.

Rudi and his classmates played basketball earlier in the morning at school. Many students watched them. The game was exciting before an accident happened. Unfortunately, Rudi injured his ankle. He fell on the court. His friends took him to the school clinic. Later in the night, he can barely sleep. ....

The best sentence to complete the paragraph is ....

a. he is hurtful enough to sleep

b. it's too painful for him too

sleep

c. it's enough hurtful for him too sleep

d. the paint is painful too to sleep

e. he ankle is enough hurt too sleep

Penjelasan:

di atas jawapin ya

Baca paragraf di bawah ini.

Rudi dan teman-teman sekelasnya bermain basket pagi-pagi sekali di sekolah. Banyak siswa yang memperhatikan mereka. Pertandingan berlangsung seru sebelum kecelakaan terjadi. Sayangnya, Rudi

related_questions.question:
Change these Reported Speech into Direct Speech    1. She said she had never seen a comet.

 2. They said it had been a wonderful time.

 3. My father asked me who I played with.

 4. He told us he was going to do judo

 5. He told me he had to help his father.

 Change the Direct Speech into Reported Speech

 1. Mum asked : "Have you got the keys?"

 2. He said ; "You should listen to the teacher."

 3. The police : "Don't park here!"

 4. Susan : "Who has drunk the water?"

 5. They asked : "Why didn't you play with us?"

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Reported to Direct:

1. "I had never seen a comet," she said.

2. "It has been a wonderful time," they said.

3. My father asked me, "Who did you play with?"

4. "I'm going to do judo," he told us.

5. He said, "I have to help my father"

Direct to Reported:

1. My mum asked me if I got the keys.

2. He told me that I should listen to the teacher.

3. The police said to not park here.

4. Susan asked who had drunk the water.

5. They asked me why I didn't play with them.

related_questions.question:
Do the LKS instruction given

mohon bantuan nya​ , terimakasih

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. The government often announces the announcement from television.

2. Asti and Nina are in the school library every day.

3. Lina sometimes fries her fried chicken in the kitchen.

4. I do not always finish all of my tasks every time.

5. Intan is not the workers in this company this time.

6. He does not watch this film.

7. What do you write in your diary book everyday.

8. I am a secretary in this office now.

9. Mirna usually cries in her room every night.

10. Mr. Hartono sometimes makes his cloth by himself.

Artinya:

1. Pemerintah sering mengungumkan pengumumannya dari televisi.

2. Asti dan Nina di perpustakaan sekolah setiap hari.

3. Lina kadang-kadang menggoreng ayam gorengnya di dapur.

4. Aku tidak selalu menyelesaikan semua tugasku setiap waktu.

5. Intan bukan pekerja di perusahaan ini kali ini.

6. Dia (laki-laki) tidak menonton filem ini.

7. Apa yang kamu tulis di buku harianmu setiap hari.

8. Aku seorang sekretaris di kantor ini sekarang.

9. Mirna biasanya menangis di kamarnya setiap malam.

10. Pak Hartono kadang-kadang membuat pakaiannya dengan sendirinya.

Semoga membantu ^_^
